nodes.text: Bonadan booze was a kind of alcoholic beverage that shared a name with the planet Bonadan. The Galactic Empire captain Sysco kept a bottle of Bonadan booze in the bottom drawer of his desk in his living quarters that were aboard the Super Star Destroyer Vengeance.
Bonadan booze was created for and first appeared in the 1998 novella Dark Forces: Rebel Agent, which was written by William C. Dietz.
